data.route_analysis: Guatemala has various options for transportation including buses and shuttles. Fly into Guatemala City for broader access. Popular routes include Antigua and Tikal.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal months are from September to November, with lesser crowd and milder weather.
data.climate: Expect mild temperatures with occasional rain. Ideal for exploring ruins and nature. Dress in layers and carry a light rain jacket.
data.culture: Explore the colorful markets, traditional dance events, and rich Mayan traditions. The Day of the Dead celebrations in November are a highlight.
